title: "LOG IN " STAYS FOR AGES
body:
good morning.

anyone can give me a hand with some problem: after i put name and pass game stay forever in "log in"mode.
and it s not started? 

any other people with this? any advice? 

best regards, 
Alex

replies.body:
Hello Guys
Same problem here !
Wat we can do?
if you go into riot files and run the game in admin it will work... well it worked for me so idk about you guys or try logging into another account and then login back to your main
nah doesnt work for me... still the same

Have the same issue here....stuck in the login screen...
NO internet issue.
the update was normal.
i run the repair 
even as administrator...Nothing at all...

There were some server issues going on with EUNE for a few hours, but they were recently resolved. If you're still having the login issue, I recommend working through the steps in our [Login Issues guide. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues)

Let me know if you have any questions.

me too ,, it's driving me crazy !!
i did everything ..
reinstall the patch
repair ..
and same problem ..
any help pls !!

I think it's either a middle-man problem, or a server issue since n'either clients work (Alpha or normal) while updating had no issues at all, just logging in. Tried several times now but it just stays there trying to authenticate without throwing any error.

Probably a network problem? I've faced it several times. Wait until it shows this error: "An unknown error has occured". And exit. Then re-open the launcher and see if it works. 

Works for me :/
